Explore South Africa’s KwaZulu-Natal and Eswatini (Swaziland) with unforgettable wildlife adventures, luxurious lodges, and stunning coastal retreats. Start your journey in the charming coastal town of Ballito before cruising the hippo-rich estuaries of St Lucia. Experience thrilling Big Five game drives in Tembe Elephant Park, then cross into Eswatini to relax by Lake Jozini—with optional tiger fishing and sunset cruises. Spend two nights at the secluded Thonga Beach Lodge on the Indian Ocean, followed by safaris in Hluhluwe–iMfolozi and the exclusive Thanda Private Game Reserve. Your adventure concludes back in Ballito with a memorable farewell dinner by the sea. This is a rare chance to discover Africa with comfort, connection, and style!
